quotation: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
author: Thomas Edison

quotation: You can observe a lot just by watching.
author: Yogi Berra

quotation: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quotation: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotation: Fate is in your hands and no one elses
author: Byron Pulsifer

quotation: Be the chief but never the lord.
author: Lao Tzu

quotation: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
author: Carl Sandburg

quotation: Well begun is half done.
author: Aristotle

quotation: Life is a learning experience, only if you learn.
author: Yogi Berra

quotation: Self-complacency is fatal to progress.
author: Margaret Sangster

quotation: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quotation: What you give is what you get.
author: Byron Pulsifer

quotation: We can only learn to love by loving.
author: Iris Murdoch

quotation: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
author: Karen Clark

quotation: You'll see it when you believe it.
author: Wayne Dyer

quotation: Today is the tomorrow we worried about yesterday.
author: Dale Carnegie

quotation: It's easier to see the mistakes on someone else's paper.
author: Cynthia Lewis

quotation: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
author: William Wallace

quotation: To lead people walk behind them.
author: Lao Tzu

quotation: Having nothing, nothing can he lose.
author: William Shakespeare

quotation: Trouble is only opportunity in work clothes.
author: Henry J. Kaiser

quotation: A rolling stone gathers no moss.
author: Publilius Syrus

quotation: Ideas are the beginning points of all fortunes.
author: Napoleon Hill

quotation: Everything in life is luck.
author: Donald Trump

quotation: Doing nothing is better than being busy doing nothing.
author: Lao Tzu

quotation: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
author: Benjamin Spock

quotation: Study the past, if you would divine the future.
author: Confucius

quotation: The day is already blessed, find peace within it.
author: iQuote Publishing

quotation: From error to error one discovers the entire truth.
author: Sigmund Freud

quotation: Well done is better than well said.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quotation: Bite off more than you can chew, then chew it.
author: Ella Williams

quotation: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.
author: Buddha

quotation: One today is worth two tomorrows.
author: Benjamin Franklin
